parameters.query: SELECT ml.id, ml.product_master_id, ml.marketplace_id, ml.item_id, ml.user_id, ml.updated_at as listing_updated_at, COALESCE(im.physical_quantity, 0) as current_stock, im.source_url, im.last_stock_check_at, pm.sku, pm.product_name FROM marketplace_listings ml JOIN products_master pm ON pm.id = ml.product_master_id AND pm.user_id = ml.user_id LEFT JOIN inventory_master im ON im.product_master_id = ml.product_master_id AND im.user_id = ml.user_id WHERE ml.status = 'active' AND ml.user_id = $1 AND (im.last_stock_check_at IS NULL OR im.last_stock_check_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '30 minutes') ORDER BY im.last_stock_check_at ASC NULLS FIRST LIMIT $2
